event: Signs out rope & harness (witnessed by rigger's assistant).
Signs out maintenance hatch key for Hale (key not confirmed returned).
Livestream begins (teen streamer confirms partial alibi).
Asks security volunteer for service hatch directions; said checking cabling.
Festival intro video plays (audio tech unsure if live or pre-recorded).
Spotted rushing past vendor #14 with leather folder, texting: 'Got the list. Meeting top.'
Maintenance crew spots dusty-jacketed figure leaving tunnels quickly; ID unconfirmed (Hale later emerges here).
Returns rope & harness; assistant notes rope dirtier/greasier than before.
Seen multiple times near ops tent talking on comms; food vendor unsure if she stayed entire time.
